# Data Generation Process
## Set True Parameters

```{r}
p_x0 = 0.36
p_x1 = 0.48
p_x2 = 0.16

p <- c(p_x0, p_x1, p_x2)
```

```{r}
RC <- 10
theta11 <- 2
beta <- 0.75
```

## Inner-loop
```{r}
out_prob <- function_inner_loop(grid = 90, params_theta_1 = c(RC, theta11), method = "linear", beta = beta, params_theta_3 = p, threshold = 1e-6)
```
